Package fit.gja.songtrainer.controller

Class SongsController

java.lang.Object
fit.gja.songtrainer.controller.SongsController
@Controller public class SongsController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling request from "songs" page.

    • SongsController

      public SongsController(SongService songService, PlaylistService playlistService, UserService userService, StorageService storageService)
      Class constructor, injects the necessary services
      Parameters:
      songService - Service handling database request about songs
      playlistService - Service handling database request about playlists
      userService - Service handling database request about users

  • Method Details

    • listSongs

      @RequestMapping(value="/songs", method=GET) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView listSongs(@RequestParam("inst") String instrumentStr)
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/songs". Passes all user's songs to model for display.
      Parameters:
      instrumentStr - String representation of which instrument's songs to display
      Returns:
      model and view object with added attributes and specified .jsp filename for "/songs"

    • showFormForAdd

      @GetMapping("/songs/addSong") public String showFormForAdd(org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/songs/addSong". Prepares data for add song form.
      Parameters:
      theModel - holder of attributes
      Returns:
      filename of .jsp that should be used for "/songs/addSong"

    • saveSong

      @PostMapping("/songs/saveSong") public String saveSong(@ModelAttribute("song") Song theSong, @RequestParam("backing_track") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile backingTrack) throws InvalidFileExtensionException, IOException, UnsupportedAudioFileException
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/songs/saveSong". Takes submitted song and saves it to database.
      Parameters:
      theSong - submitted song
      Returns:
      redirects back to the songs display
      Throws:
      InvalidFileExtensionException
      IOException
      UnsupportedAudioFileException

    • deleteSong

      @GetMapping("/songs/deleteSong") public String deleteSong(@RequestParam("songId") Long theSongId, @RequestParam(value="playlistId",required=false) Long thePlaylistId)
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/playlist/deleteSong"
      Parameters:
      theSongId - id of song to delete
      thePlaylistId - id of playlist
      Returns:
      redirects back to the playlist

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/songs/showUpdateForm") public String showUpdateForm(@RequestParam("songId") Long theId, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/songs/showUpdateForm". Prepares data for update song form.
      Parameters:
      theId - id of the song to edit
      theModel - handler of attributes
      Returns:
      filename of .jsp that should be used for "/songs/showUpdateForm"

    • showAddToPlaylistForm

      @GetMapping("/songs/showAddToPlaylistForm") public String showAddToPlaylistForm(@RequestParam("songId") Long theSongId, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/songs/showAddToPlaylistForm". Prepares data for the form.
      Parameters:
      theSongId - id of the song to add to playlist
      theModel - handler of attributes
      Returns:
      filename of .jsp with form to add song to playlist

    • saveSong

      @PostMapping("/songs/saveSongToPlaylist") public String saveSong(@ModelAttribute("songId") Long theSongId, @ModelAttribute("playlist") Playlist thePlaylist)
      Controller method responsible for mapping "/songs/saveSongToPlaylist".
      Parameters:
      theSongId - id of song to add to playlist
      thePlaylist - playlist to which add song
      Returns:
      redirect back to all songs display
